chapters.title: Chapter 8: The Seven-Striped Lass
chapters.info: Joline Maza, p. 158—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She was a Sitter for the Green, appointed after one of the Green's sitters left for Salidar. Elaida asked her to resign her position after only weeks and sent her to Ebou Dar to meet with Queen Tylin of Altara. She has two Warders named Blaeric and Fen. One might think Joline has a wish to become a damane; she is very careless around the Seanchan. She is slender and pretty, and has big brown eyes. She is everything Teslyn is not. Mat thinks she would never be taken for someone he liked; he would be unwilling even to wish her on one of his enemies. See also Mizar, Fen; Negina, Blaeric.
